unnormalised: **Upcoming Sporting Events in India: A Comprehensive Schedule**
normalised: **Upcoming Sporting Events in India: A Comprehensive Schedule**

unnormalised: The Indian sporting calendar is packed with a diverse range of events in the coming months. Sports enthusiasts can look forward to a variety of competitions, from national tournaments to international fixtures. This article provides a detailed schedule of some of the most anticipated sporting events across the country, covering various disciplines and catering to a wide range of interests.
normalised: The Indian sporting calendar is packed with a diverse range of events in the coming months. Sports enthusiasts can look forward to a variety of competitions, from national tournaments to international fixtures. This article provides a detailed schedule of some of the most anticipated sporting events across the country, covering various disciplines and catering to a wide range of interests.

unnormalised: The schedule kicks off with the Pro Kabaddi League, Season 11, starting on 02/12/2024 and continuing till February 2025. Matches will be held across various cities, including Mumbai, Jaipur and Delhi. Fans can check local listings for specific timings. Following closely is the Ranji Trophy, the premier domestic cricket tournament, beginning on 05/01/2025 and concluding in March 2025.
normalised: The schedule kicks off with the Pro Kabaddi League, Season eleven, starting on second december two thousand and twenty four and continuing till February two thousand and twenty five. Matches will be held across various cities, including Mumbai, Jaipur and Delhi. Fans can check local listings for specific timings. Following closely is the Ranji Trophy, the premier domestic cricket tournament, beginning on fifth January two thousand and twenty five and concluding in March two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: In Athletics, the National Games are scheduled to be held in Goa from 18/10/2024 to 09/11/2024. The games will feature athletes from all states and union territories, competing in a wide array of track and field events. Furthermore, the Federation Cup Senior Athletics Championship is penciled in for 12/05/2025, providing a crucial platform for athletes to qualify for international competitions.
normalised: In Athletics, the National Games are scheduled to be held in Goa from eighteenth October two thousand and twenty four to ninth November two thousand and twenty four. The games will feature athletes from all states and union territories, competing in a wide array of track and field events. Furthermore, the Federation Cup Senior Athletics Championship is penciled in for twelfth May two thousand and twenty five, providing a crucial platform for athletes to qualify for international competitions.

unnormalised: For football aficionados, the Indian Super League (ISL) is set to begin its new season on 20/10/2024, running until May 2025. Expect nail-biting matches every week with Kolkata and Kochi as prominent venues. Hockey lovers can look forward to the Hockey India League commencing on 15/01/2025. This league showcases the best of Indian and international hockey talent, providing exciting entertainment for spectators.
normalised: For football aficionados, the Indian Super League (I-S-L) is set to begin its new season on twentieth October two thousand and twenty four, running until May two thousand and twenty five. Expect nail-biting matches every week with Kolkata and Kochi as prominent venues. Hockey lovers can look forward to the Hockey India League commencing on fifteenth January two thousand and twenty five. This league showcases the best of Indian and international hockey talent, providing exciting entertainment for spectators.

unnormalised: The All India Tennis Association (AITA) has a busy schedule with numerous tournaments planned across the country. The National Tennis Championship, for seniors, is scheduled for 10/11/2024. Keep an eye on AITA’s official website for local level tournaments. The Chess calendar includes the National Chess Championship to be held on 01/03/2025 and the details will soon be available.
normalised: The All India Tennis Association (A-I-T-A) has a busy schedule with numerous tournaments planned across the country. The National Tennis Championship, for seniors, is scheduled for tenth November two thousand and twenty four. Keep an eye on A-I-T-A’s official website for local level tournaments. The Chess calendar includes the National Chess Championship to be held on first March two thousand and twenty five and the details will soon be available.

unnormalised: This schedule is subject to change based on prevailing conditions and logistical requirements. Sports fans are advised to consult official websites and media outlets for the latest updates and confirmed timings. With a diverse range of events lined up, the coming months promise a thrilling experience for sports enthusiasts across India. Stay tuned for more updates on event timings and schedules.
